Class: Object2D

Object2D(name, options, scene)

Object2D for basic object position and bound Info

Constructor

new Object2D(name, options, scene)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string object name.
options Object2DOptions options for basic object such as positions boundInfo
scene Scene targeted scene
Properties:
Name Type Description
name string object name.
options Object2DOptions options for basic object such as positions boundInfo
scene Scene targeted scene
id string unique identifier readonly
width number width for object
height number height for object
position Vector3 | Vector2 options.position
boundInfo BoundInfo minimum xy and maximum xy. readonly ,depending on height and width.
